sentences.english: It is used for petroleum exploration and engineering tasks such as simulating aircraft designs.
sentences.chinese: 用于石油勘探和工程任务，如模拟飞机的设计。

sentences.english: It was butane vapor, leaking from a corroded steel pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 那是从腐蚀的钢制石油管道中泄露的丁烷蒸汽。

sentences.english: The first skid-mounted drilling rigs exported to Hungary were manufactured by RG PETRO-MACHINERY(GROUP)CO. , LTD.
sentences.chinese: 第一台出口欧盟的钻机由南阳二机石油装备集团制造。

sentences.english: With the oil prices up, people would rather to use E-bike.
sentences.chinese: 随着石油价格的上涨，人们更加愿意使用电单车。

sentences.english: But US stock markets tumbled along with oil and gold.
sentences.chinese: 而美国股市及石油和黄金期货价格却集体暴跌。

sentences.english: The government agreed to backstop companies that invested in oil exploration.
sentences.chinese: 政府同意支持那些对石油勘查投资的公司。

sentences.english: All highly flammable bulk storage containers will be kept in the oil storage room.
sentences.chinese: 所有高可燃性散装贮存容器将被保存在石油储存室。

sentences.english: Then the price of oil began a nearly two-decade slide.
sentences.chinese: 随后，石油价格开始了近二十年的下滑。

sentences.english: Nickel naphthenate is used broadly in petrochemical and chemical scopes.
sentences.chinese: 环烷酸镍是石油化工领域内的重要助剂。

sentences.english: Petroleum industry is one of industrial systems which is puzzled by metal corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 石油工业是最受金属腐蚀问题困惑的工业之一。

sentences.english: Especially the offshore petroleum industry, which is an industry of relatively high risk.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是海上石油行业，这是一个相对风险性高的行业。

sentences.english: The company's production from the 22 producing concessions last year totaled over 51, 000 barrels of oil equivalent per day.
sentences.chinese: 公司去年22个产区平均每天产5万一千桶石油。

sentences.english: These negotiations matter hugely for the peak-oil debate.
sentences.chinese: 关于气候变化的协商对石油峰值讨论至关重要。

sentences.english: The terms under which China Sonangol buys oil from Angola have never been made public.
sentences.chinese: 中国和安中石油签订的石油采购条款从未被曝光。

sentences.english: The terms under which China Sonangol buys oil from Angola have never been made public.
sentences.chinese: 中国和安中石油签订的石油采购条款从未被曝光。

sentences.english: China has accused Saudi Arabia of dumping petrochemicals on its markets.
sentences.chinese: 中国指责沙特在中国市场上倾销石油化工产品。
